title.rendered: Hobart vs Sydney, Australian T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Hobart: Caleb Jewell, Ben McDermott (wk), Zak Crawley, D Arcy Short, Tim David, Asif Ali, Mitchell Owen, Faheem Ashraf, Tom Andrews, Nathan Ellis (c), Riley Meredith

Sydney: David Warner, Matthew Gilkes (wk), Sam Whiteman, Oliver Davies, Alex Ross, Daniel Sams, Ben Cutting, Nathan McAndrew, Chris Green (c), Brendan Doggett, Usman Qadir

Venue: Bellerive Oval, Hobart

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games.)

First innings average score: 143

Second innings average score: 142

Weather: Clear

Wickets per innings: 7

Wins

Batting first: 33%

Batting second: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

For 3 consecutive games, Caleb Jewell has featured in the Ultimate Team. Moreover, his last 2 scores at Hobart read 70 and 54.

Meanwhile, Matthew Wade averages only 22 with the bat in his previous 24 visits to Hobart. With the gloves too, he has inflicted only 13 dismissals. However, he blasted 67 off 30 against Sydney a few weeks ago.

For 3 games in a row, Daniel Sams has gone wicketless. Against Hobart, he has taken 11 wickets in 10 games, including the best figures of 4 for 34 in 2020.

When these two sides met earlier in the league, Nathan Ellis and Ben Doggett were a part of the Ultimate Team for bagging a 4-for each.

In the same match, Oliver Davies smashed 65 off 32. He also slammed 52 off 36 in his last game against Perth.

An average of 31 boundaries have been hit per game this season at Hobart.

In the last 3 games, 72% of the wickets have fallen to the seamers at the Bellerive Oval.
